description: This file sets up a team of agents with specific tools and models, and demonstrates interactions with the team by requesting responses to various prompts.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent with a specific role, model, and tools.

classes.name: Claude
classes.description: Model class for Anthropic's Claude model.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Model class for OpenAI's chat models.

classes.name: Team
classes.description: Represents a team of agents with shared tools and configurations.

classes.name: DuckDuckGoTools
classes.description: Tools for web search via DuckDuckGo.

classes.name: YFinanceTools
classes.description: Tools for financial data retrieval from Yahoo Finance.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method to output a response from the team, with options for streaming and reasoning display.
